contentList.content: A king's weapon. Meant to be the greatest in Asgard. In theory, it could even summon the Bifrost.
On weapon hit, deals [1] to up to [2] other foes within 10m.

The wielder gains <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage. Its Lightning and Thunder spells deal additional Lightning and Thunder damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. While using Stormbreaker, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Beetus_Thor_Stormbreaker_2H_Passive_ChainLightning">Chain Lightning</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Beetus_Thor_Stormbreaker_2H_Passive_LightningBolt">Lightning Bolt</LSTag>.
A king's instrument. Meant to be the greatest in Asgard. In theory, its harmonies could even evoke the shimmering span of the Bifrost.
GET HELP! Please! My brother's dying! Get help! Help him!
Call forth a beam of crackling lightning that forks on impact, hitting up to [1] additional foe(s) within [2].
Call down lightning that strikes 6 times randomly in a [1] radius, damaging creatures within [2] of each impact.
The Odinforce can be used to fuel powerful lightning abilities.
Channel your power through Stormbreaker to boost your allies attacks or make enemies feel the wrath of the storm.

All other allies within [1] of range deal an additional [2] with weapon attacks. Additionally, their successful weapon attacks cause a bolt of lightning to fork from the target to a nearby foe within [3], dealing [4]

Character is enchanted with a portion of Thor's power, dealing an additional [1] with each weapon attack. Additionally, successful weapon attacks cause a bolt of lightning to fork from the target to a nearby foe within [2], dealing [3]
Nearby foes within [1] of range become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Lightning damage
Character is caught in a lightning storm and is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Lightning damage
Your spells that deal Lightning or Thunder damage gain +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>

Your spells and spell attacks that deal Lightning or Thunder damage gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> and spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack rolls</LSTag>.
At the start of your turn, you heal for [1].
When the wielder deals damage with this weapon or with a spell, they gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
Deliver a thundering strike to your target, possibly knocking it back [1].
A shockwave that deals Thunder damage to enemies.

Leap toward target area and slam the ground with Stormbreaker, knocking creatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. The force from the leap knocks creatures back [1] who fail a Strength Saving Throw. Additionally, the leap triggers a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Beetus_Thor_Stormbreaker_2H_BringMeThanos_Shockwave">Thunderous Shockwave</LSTag> that deals additional Thunder damage to enemies within [2].
Whosoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor.
Deliver a lightning imbued strike to your target, possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Unleash a blast of lightning from Mjolnir at a creature.

Strike your target with a heavy swing from Mjolnir, possibly knocking them back [1]. Deals an additional [2] to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETRIFIED">Petrified</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROZEN">Frozen</LSTag> targets, as well as those with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STONESKIN">Stone Skin</LSTag>.
Throw Mjolnir at a target, causing a lightning explosion on impact, dealing [1] to all characters in a [2] radius.
Lightning spells deal an additional [1] and inflict [2] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag> upon the target(s).
Thunder spells deal an additional [1] and grant [2] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag> to the wielder.
Slam Stormbreaker on the groud, unleashing a shockwave in a [1] radius, possibly knocking foes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>
Charge forward with Stormbreaker, striking all non-Ally characters and objects with thunderous force.
A bolt of lightning strikes the target area, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazing</LSTag> targets in a [1] radius on impact.
Channel your power through Mjolnir to call down [1] lightning strikes in quick succession, each strike dealing [2].
Make a melee attack with Stormbreaker. If the attack hits, lightning forks from the target to up to [1] foe(s) within [2], dealing [3].
Call down lightning in the area to restore [1] to downed allies.
Make a melee attack with Mjolnir, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> the target.
If you are struck with Lightning damage in combat, a bolt of lightning will fork from you and strike a nearby foe within [1] for [2]. This effect can only happen once per turn.
Deliver a thundering strike with Stormbreaker, triggering a thunderous echo that deals [1] to all other foes within [2] and knocks them back [3].
Attacks with this weapon have a chance to knock target(s) <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag>.
Channel a beam of lightning through Stormbreaker at a target, causing bolts of lightning to fork from the target, striking up to [1] more foe(s) within [2] for [3].
Leap toward the target area and slam the ground with Mjolnir, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocking</LSTag> characters hit.

While your off-hand is empty, ranged attacks against you have -[1] to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. Additionally, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Ranged attacks against you have -[1] to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> due to weilding Mjolnir with an empty off-hand.
